name: Sanitize DB
author: Ankit Chugh

sections.description:
The plugin sanitizes the database by removing the unused meta entries and other unlinked records from the database. It removes unused data one by one and displays statistics on the plugin dashboard after a database scan. This plugin is useful when your website is very slow and there are so many unused plugins in your WordPress admin.

NOTE: Please do clear or purge website cache after plugin activation.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin follow below steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Clear or purge website cache.
  4. Here we go, no other settings needed.
sections.faq:
When this plugin is useful?

This plugin is useful when your website is very slow and there are so many unused plugins in your wordpress admin. This plugin removes the unused meta left by other plugins and improves the performance of your website. It removes unused data one by one and displays statistics on plugin dashboard after a database scan.

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
